testCases.title: User should see the username field
testCases.expectedResults: Username field is visible on the login page.

testCases.title: User should be able to login with valid details
testCases.expectedResults: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

testCases.title: Enter valid email
testCases.expectedResults: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

testCases.title: Enter invalid email without '@'
steps: Enter an invalid email address without '@'.
testCases.expectedResults: Error message is displayed indicating invalid email format.

testCases.title: Enter valid email
testCases.expectedResults: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

testCases.title: Enter invalid email without '@'
steps: Enter an invalid email address without '@'.
testCases.expectedResults: Error message is displayed indicating invalid email format.

testCases.title: Enter valid email
testCases.expectedResults: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.
